about_the_game:
Horror game.
The player needs to get out of the maze with animatronics.

The player has lives that are reduced when the animatron comes close, in order to scare him the player needs to scream use a key F on the keyboard.

The scream has a cooldown, so you need to think carefully about when to scream and when to run away.

The game has achievements and a leaderboard.

Have fun in the maze!
detailed_description:
Horror game.
The player needs to get out of the maze with animatronics.

The player has lives that are reduced when the animatron comes close, in order to scare him the player needs to scream use a key F on the keyboard.

The scream has a cooldown, so you need to think carefully about when to scream and when to run away.

The game has achievements and a leaderboard.

Have fun in the maze!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
